question: Ingress manifest with two paths: '/api' -> api-svc:80 and '/' -> web-svc:80.
suggested_answer:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  name: routes
spec:
  rules:
  - http:
      paths:
      - path: /api
        pathType: Prefix
        backend:
          service:
            name: api-svc
            port:
              number: 80
      - path: /
        pathType: Prefix
        backend:
          service:
            name: web-svc
            port:
              number: 80
